title: Rotating Queue gone?
body:
Logged on tonight to play some rotating queue cos I haven't had a fun game in a while... But the queue isn't there, and I can't seem to find any posts about it going..

Any help?

Please, no trolls.

replies.body:
Sorry for the late reply.

RGM is not currently available in the new client, so you'll have to switch back to the legacy client (from the login page) to play the RGMs.
I see, thanks for replying though. I'll revert back now.
